reviewText:
I love this product you must buy it if you can
honestly worth the money will give you excitement upon arrival
It works great and I have just one more to finish the Johto show. Thanks again and it was very fast

Its a pain in the a** to find the Johto series on DVD, but still a great show, brings back so many memories. If you're a Pokemon fan, i would recommend buying this. I just wish they could re-release the Johto, Master Quest, Advanced, Advanced Challenge and Advanced Battle seasons in there own box sets so everyone can get a chance to buy them.
